text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia laxissima is a species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is endemic to Bolivia.
text.Cultivars:
Tillandsia 'Feather Belle'
Tillandsia 'Tropic Delight'
xVrieslandsia 'Pink Magic'
text.References:
